Name: just a game to test your lQ
About the game: You applied for a free IQ test on the Internet out of curiosity. On a quiet, dark night, 'World's Best IQ Test Specialist' comes to your house. You just have to solve a simple quiz. If you can. (This game is a horror game) Objective -Solve as many quizzes as you can while avoiding deliverymen, mannequin, and lunatic. -Compete on the leaderboard by achieving high scores.
